alternativeNames: Wen Kuang, Hu; Hu, Wen Guang
examples: Rhododendron verruciferum W.K. Hu in Acta Phytotax. Sin. 26(4): 301 (1988)
source: A 'Dictionary of the Families and Genera of Chinese Seed Plants' ed. How  Foon-chew (1982). Index Herb. Sin.: 313 (1993) (year of birth 1914).  Index Herbariorum: 249 (1990) (year of birth 1922)
